title: of State at the Department of Justice, Home Affairs and Migration) Order 2025.
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser (Minister
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser (Minister 
of State at the Department of Justice, Home Affairs and Migration) Order 2025.
text_norm: 1 order may cited appointment special adviser (minister state department justice home affair migration) order 2025

title: of State at the Department of Justice, Home Affairs and Migration) Order 2025.
heading: Jack White, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the
text_raw:
2. 

Jack White, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the 
office of the Department of Justice, Home Affairs and Migration, is appointed 
to be a Special Adviser to Niall Collins, Minister of State at the Department of 
Justice, Home Affairs and Migration, with effect from 12 February 2025. 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Government, 

24 June, 2025. 

MICHEÁL MARTIN, 

Taoiseach. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 1st July, 2025. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [401] 3
